short_summary: Request for Quotation - Dell Pro Stereo Headset or Equivalent
description: This is a notification of a proposed procurement for Health Canada. The procurement is for Dell Pro Stereo Headset or Equivalent, as per the Statement of Requirement and List of Deliverables in the Request for Quotation. Delivery will be made to Ottawa, Ontario. The deadline for submission of bids is October 31, 2022 at 14:00 hours EST. The procurement method is competitive and open to all suppliers.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Request for Quotation for Dell Pro Stereo Headset or Equivalent**

**Reference:** SSC-22-00020439:T
**Solicitation Number:** BPM017155/20439
**Publication Date:** October 17, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** October 31, 2022 14:00:00 (local time)

**Background**

Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites suppliers to respond to a Request for Quotation (RFQ) for the procurement of Dell Pro Stereo Headset or Equivalent. This RFQ is released in accordance with the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and other applicable trade agreements.

**Description of Requirement**

The Government of Canada requires the procurement of Dell Pro Stereo Headset or Equivalent for Health Canada. The successful bidder must provide the required item in accordance with the Statement of Requirements and List of Deliverables outlined in this RFQ.

**Key Details**

* Delivery destination: Ottawa, Ontario
* Delivery date: 90 federal government working days from the contract award date
* Security requirements: N/A
* Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCA): N/A

**Eligibility and Procurement**

* This RFQ is open to all qualified suppliers
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement
* The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract

**Submission and Communication**

To access the solicitation and submit a bid, please click the link: [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login)

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French)
* All enquiries related to this solicitation must be addressed in writing to the procurement officer:
	+ Tara Halajko, Shared Services Canada ([Tara.Halajko@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:Tara.Halajko@ssc-spc.gc.ca))
	+ Phone: 343-999-5042

**Attachments**

Please refer to the links provided in the attachments section for additional information and resources.

**Closing**

The tender closing date is October 31, 2022, at 14:00:00 (local time). Late submissions will not be accepted. SSC reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Note: I condensed
